name: Little Guys World
description:
It started with a little dream. 

"I want to make a little world for little guys to have fun in."

Now you, our roaming adventurer, can visit Little Guys Ville and rally a team of villagers to your side as you explore the world, battle monsters, and fight for the freedom of this special town.

While exploring seven little landscapes on your journey, be sure to collect and combine items to assign new jobs to your teammates! Will they be the right Ranger for your party? Or will you run into some unintended consequences.

Only time will tell as you venture forth into Little Guys World!

Credits:

Sound: Ace Luke (they/she) (@AceLukeMusic)

Writer/Designer: Amanda Cotter (she/her) (@ac_pi)

Artist: March (she/her) (@pixelmrch)

Artist: Ruby Tucker (they/them) (@ikiruse)

Programmer/Designer: Scott Anderson (he/him) (@sranderson)

Programmer/Designer: Yori Kvitchko (he/him) (@YoriKv)
